lines.Vitus: "How about we invite Herclaus to bathe with us?"
"Maybe ask what he thinks about being summoned as well."

lines.Volesus: "Herclaus? Sure, I'd love the chance to get closer to a Hero like him."

lines.Herclaus: "Crown Mages, I hear your call!"
"A call to a very steamy room, it would seem."
"May I ask where we are?"
"Mosaics? Heated pools? Machines that transport water?"
"A spectacle out of bathing?!"
"It's about time!"
"I suppose that means I should undress."
"Very well!"

lines: (We had to turn away when he started stripping in front of us.)
(It's easy to forget that military men don't really think much about that sort of thing.)

lines.Herclaus: "Much more comfortable!"

lines.Volesus: "And now we want to ask some questions if you don't mind?"

lines.Herclaus: "Mind?"

lines.Vitus: "We just want to know how you feel about, well, being summoned by us Crown Mages?"

lines.Herclaus: "Feel?"

lines.Volesus: "Being asked for your help. Being transported to a new location at any moment?"

lines.Herclaus: "When I am called by a Crown Mage to defeat their enemies, I feel strong."
"It feels good to feel strong."
"You tell me what you need me to do, and I'll do my best."
"There's not much more to it than that."

lines.Volesus: "But what happens when you disagree with a Crown Mage."

lines.Herclaus: "Oh that happened all the time."
"But that doesn't change my situation much, does it?"
"The Crown Mage asks something of me, and I perform."
"That's how it is, and how it's always been."

lines.Volesus: "But what if the Crown Mage wants to do evil?"

lines.Vitus: "I thought we were trying to relax, Volesus."

lines.Volesus: "No, hold on, this is good stuff."

lines.Herclaus: "Well that hasn't really happened before."
"I suppose if they were, they would need to start getting very specific with all their commands."
"Because it may not end well for them if I happened to misunderstand their words."
"But I can pretend to be if you need me to!"

lines.Vitus: "...You two are starting to worry me."
